# Snapaper

> Snapaper offers CAIE past papers and study resources for IGCSE and A-Level students.

## Docs
- [Homepage](https://snapaper.com) - Main site and resource hub.

## Policies
- [Robots.txt](https://snapaper.com/robots.txt) - Crawler directives.
- [Sitemap](https://snapaper.com/sitemap.xml) - Indexable pages.
